modules.description: This module draws variable assignments that satisfy a given logical formula, using the Lutin random toss machinery. It operates on lists of variables and formulas from the `Exp` module, producing lists of satisfying assignments. It supports drawing from constraints directly or from a DIMACS file representation.

This module parses and prints DIMACS CNF formatted strings, converting them into a structured representation of boolean clauses. It processes formulas in conjunctive normal form, extracting variables and clauses for use in SAT solving or logical analysis. The parsed data can be transformed into an abstract formula representation for further manipulation or evaluation.
